_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five drawbacks of uninspiring conduc: After examination, sensible people criticize you
You feel lost when you die
After death, you’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell
The five benefits of inspiring conduct [: After examination, sensible people praise you
You don’t feel lost when you die
After death, you’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm
